digest_items.title: Rotate API keys quarterly
digest_items.why: Regular rotation limits the window of exposure if keys are compromised
digest_items.fix: Set calendar reminders and use secret management tools like HashiCorp Vault

digest_items.title: Use environment variables for secrets
digest_items.why: Hardcoded secrets in code are exposed in version control
digest_items.fix: Store secrets in .env files (gitignored) or secret management services

digest_items.title: Use TLS 1.3 exclusively
digest_items.why: Older TLS versions have known vulnerabilities and weaker cipher suites
digest_items.fix: Update server config to disable TLS 1.0, 1.1, 1.2 and enable only TLS 1.3

digest_items.title: Use secure random number generation
digest_items.fix: Use crypto.randomBytes() or secrets module, not Math.random()

digest_items.title: Use subresource integrity (SRI)
digest_items.why: SRI prevents compromised CDN resources from executing malicious code
digest_items.fix: Add integrity attribute to script and link tags loading external resources

digest_items.title: Enable audit logging
digest_items.why: Audit logs are essential for incident response and compliance
digest_items.fix: Log authentication events, data access, and configuration changes
